detectors.description:
Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenLock__1.sol#67-70) should emit an event for: 
	- pendingOwner = _newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenLock__1.sol#69)

TokenLock.isUnlocked() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenLock__1.sol#104-106) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now > unlockTime (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenLock__1.sol#105)
detectors.markdown:
[TokenLock.isUnlocked()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenLock__1.sol#L104-L106) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [now > unlockTime](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TokenLock__1.sol#L105)
